subject: Lesson Report for Val (Tue Nov 28, 2023 at 06:30 PM)
body:
Val Lessons Report: Tue Nov 28, 2023 at 06:30 PM

We worked on 'You've Got a Friend in Me' for the first third of the lesson.

Then, we worked the rest of the way through 'The Weight' and used it to explore stategies for soloing. We learned the terms 'Referencing' and 'Quoting'


If any of this is incorrect, please contact us at:
